verbs.description: < p > Illinois Republicans in Congress [V: are] making an urgent plea to President Donald Trump : Do n't let Rod Blagojevich off the hook.</p >
[ARG0: < p > Illinois Republicans in Congress] are [V: making] [ARG1: an urgent plea] [ARG2: to President Donald Trump] : [C-ARG1: Do n't let Rod Blagojevich off the hook.</p] >
